title: NFL Coaching Rumors with Jason La Canfora (Football 1/02)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports NFL Insider Jason La Canfora to break down all the latest news in coaching discussions, including what's going on with John Harbaugh's situation (3:30), who the Browns are keying in on for their job (8:30), what's going on with Adam Gase and the interest in him for jobs (13:00), the legitimate buzz around Pat Fitzgerald and the Packers (14:45) and where they could go after that (16:15), what the Jets could do and if Gase or Mike McCarthy could fit there (18:30), whether Todd Monkey is a legit head coaching candidate (21:00), if Arizona is a good job right now and whether they can pull off a Rams/Bears blueprint over the last two years (24:15), the big problems in Denver right now (29:30), if Mike Munchak can land another head coaching job (34:00), which job is worse between the Buccaneers and Dolphins (36:30), if Hue Jackson is really getting the Bengals job (39:00), how hot Dan Quinn's seat is right now (41:00), if Ron Rivera is still safe (43:30), the Antonio Brown situation (44:15), staff changes that could happen in Pittsburgh (49:00) and much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
